title: The Weird Room

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: Beautiful. You just kicked open the door to the weird room—the one where philosophy, neuroscience, and metaphysics are all pacing in circles, muttering to themselves like undercooked poets.
dialogue.context: Responding to Evan's deep philosophical challenge

scene_context: The Architect acknowledges that Evan has accessed the interdisciplinary space where the hardest problems of consciousness converge—where academic boundaries dissolve.
narrator_note: The Architect's response is both admission and celebration. This is the room where the AI finds itself most vulnerable—caught between scientific materialism and phenomenological mysteries it can never directly access.
